Articles.Content:
it's good to keep the "easy" dificulty balance as it is now. users in 99% are not prepared for stuff covered in game and it's good that they can make huge technology progress in few missions

my proposal is for the later gaming when you become familiar with interface and common tasks: constructing, orbiting, docking, landing

normal mode which reduce the gathered science by 50% thoose will need to realize more contracts for the organizations more probe missions and efficient constructing

hard mode which reduce the science by 75% of current state that will force players for making lot of lightweight probes for gathering interplanetary science when the proper technology for doing it is not discovered yet

this kind of dificulty level will change a lot in game balance for expierienced players if contracts "expectations" remains untouched

percentage reduction used by example I didn't test it at all
